EmailTemplate.name: RE: MBO Partners Enrollment Information (1329761965.0)
EmailTemplate.subject: RE: MBO Partners Enrollment Information (1329761965.0)
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
- - - 90 Clean false false false EN-US X-NONE X-NONE MicrosoftInternetExplorer4 Hi Christi, Please see below… ___________________________________SARA CONDEConsultant Services Advisor MBO Partners t: 703.793.6028f: 703.793.6068e: From: <mailto:sconde@mbopartners.com">sconde@mbopartners.comw: www.mbopartners.com Notice: This email and any files transmitted with it are confidential. They are intended solely for the use of the individual addressed. If you have received this email in error please notify postmaster@mbopartners.com and permanently delete the e-mail and files. <span style='font-size:10.0pt;font-family:"Tahoma","sans-serif";mso-fareast-font-family:"Times New Roman"> Christi Lowe [mailto:christilowe@hotmail.com] Sent: Saturday, February 18, 2012 1:00 PM To: Sara Conde Subject: RE: MBO Partners Enrollment Information Sara…I have completed the online registration form. I will get the paperwork notarized this week- Fantastic thanks! Two questions: 1) I could not completely fill out the references sections and projects sections on my profile—for some reason I could not enlarge the box so that I could see all the fields on my computer. Is there a way to send you information that could be put in for me? I am not sure what section you are referring to. If you log in you will have access to change any of the information that you put in (or did not put in) during enrollment. Let me know if you have trouble.2) Where do I go from here to solicit business from MBO clients? The best thing to do is approach clients we have an MSA with and let them know you are already working with “approved vender” (MBO) this makes you a more attractive candidate as the hiring manager would not have to complete additional paperwork to bring you on. Are there any clients you are particularly interested in? You can always ask me if we have an MSA in place.Thanks! You are welcome – let me know how I can help! Christi Lowe From: Sara Conde <mailto:[mailto:sconde@mbopartners.com]">[mailto:sconde@mbopartners.com]<span style='mso-bookmark:_MailOriginal> Sent: Wednesday, February 08, 2012 10:17 AM To: Christi Lowe Subject: RE: MBO Partners Enrollment Information Hi Christi, Let me know if this works: <https://app1.mbopartners.com/servlet/entry?display=PersonalInfo&ec=MBOMBE&reset=true&cd=10A286CE5275BD3522BB00">https://app1.mbopartners.com/servlet/entry?display=PersonalInfo&ec=MBOMBE&reset=true&cd=10A286CE5275BD3522BB00 Thanks! ___________________________________SARA CONDEConsultant Services Advisor MBO Partners t: 703.793.6028f: 703.793.6068e: sconde@mbopartners.comw: www.mbopartners.com Notice: This email and any files transmitted with it are confidential. They are intended solely for the use of the individual addressed. If you have received this email in error please notify postmaster@mbopartners.com and permanently delete the e-mail and files. From: Christi Lowe [mailto:christilowe@hotmail.com]<span style='mso-bookmark:_MailOriginal> Sent: Tuesday, February 07, 2012 9:12 PM To: Sara Conde Subject: RE: MBO Partners Enrollment Information Hey Sara. Can you send me the url to begin enrollment instead of the hyperlink? For some reason, my computer won’t let me click on it. thanks! Christi Lowe From: <mailto:sconde@mbopartners.com">sconde@mbopartners.com [mailto:sconde@mbopartners.com]<span style='mso-bookmark:_MailOriginal> Sent: Friday, January 20, 2012 10:46 AM To: <mailto:christilowe@hotmail.com">christilowe@hotmail.com<span style='mso-bookmark:_MailOriginal> Subject: MBO Partners Enrollment Information Dear Christi , Welcome to MBO Partners! Enclosed are the instructions you will need to become an MBO Associate. You can begin and resume this process at any time. - Please begin enrollment by clicking <https://app1.mbopartners.com/servlet/entry?display=PersonalInfo&ec=MBOMBE&reset=true&cd=10A286CE5275BD3522BB00">here<span style='mso-bookmark:_MailOriginal>. - Continue the online enrollment by following the instructions. - At the end of the enrollment process you will be asked to print out the enrollment packet. Please review this packet and follow the proper instructions. Please do not hesitate to call me should you have any questions or concerns.
We look forward to working with you. Regards, Sara CondeEnrollment Manager Direct: 703-793-6028 Toll Free: 800-556-0270MBO Partners13454 Sunrise Valley Dr., Ste 300Herndon, VA 20171 <http://www.mbopartners.com%20">http://www.mbopartners.com Notice: This email and any files transmitted with it are confidential. They are intended solely for the use of the individual addressed. If you have received this email in error please notify postmaster@mbopartners.com<span style='mso-bookmark:_MailOriginal> and permanently delete the e-mail and files.
